section.title: Dynamic Field Driver Extension Example
section.para: Driver extensions will be loaded transparently into the Driver itself as a base class, all defined object and properties from the Driver will be accessible in the extension.

note.para: All new functions implemented in the Driver extension should be defined in a Backend extension, as every function is called from the Backend Object.

section.title: Code Example:
section.para: In this section the Foo extension for Text field driver is shown and explained. The extension only implements the function Foo().
